parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The battery recall and software issues can cause the vehicle's battery to catch fire, resulting in a safety risk to the driver and passengers. The software update limiting the charging capacity of the battery can also reduce the vehicle's range and performance.
symptoms: The vehicle's battery may not charge to 100%
the vehicle's range is reduced
the vehicle's battery may overheat
and the vehicle may not start.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear camera mirror can cause the driver to lose visibility, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The rear camera mirror display goes black
the mirror assembly turns off
and the mirror assembly becomes extremely hot to the touch.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Water ingress and electrical issues can cause the vehicle's electrical systems to malfunction, resulting in a safety risk to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: Water collects in the rear hatch
the audio amplifier shorts out
and all sounds are disabled
including warning sounds and turn signal clicks.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Dealership Issues and Lack of Parts Availability
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Dealership issues and lack of parts availability can cause delays in repairing recalled vehicles, leaving drivers at risk.
symptoms: Dealerships are unable to perform recall repairs due to lack of parts
dealerships are unable to diagnose issues
and dealerships are unresponsive to customer concerns.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the infotainment system can cause distraction while driving, leading to accidents.
symptoms: The infotainment system goes black when plugging in a phone
and sometimes when the phone isn't plugged in.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delayed replacement of recalled batteries can reduce the vehicle's range, making it difficult for owners to use their vehicles, and potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: Reduced battery range
inability to charge to full capacity
and lack of replacement batteries despite open recalls.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear camera view can reduce visibility, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The rear camera view changes to a "zoomed" view with a fisheye effect
reducing visibility.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Sudden acceleration can cause accidents, injuries, and fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly accelerates out of control
even when the brakes are applied.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The design flaw in the floor liners can cause the accelerator pedal to become lodged, leading to sudden acceleration and accidents.
symptoms: The accelerator pedal becomes lodged under the floor liner
causing the vehicle to accelerate rapidly.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Check Engine Light and Charging Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The check engine light and charging issues can cause anxiety and uncertainty while driving, potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: The check engine light appears while charging
and OnStar reports no issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Spontaneous window shattering can cause injuries and accidents.
symptoms: The driver window glass shatters without any external impact.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The lack of a rear headrest can increase the risk of injury in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The vehicle lacks a rear headrest
despite having three seatbelts.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle to lose propulsion, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences a loss of propulsion
the clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
the clutch pedal sticks to the floor
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear
error messages appear on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Loss of Propulsion (Conditions Not Right For Shift Error)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The loss of propulsion can cause the vehicle to become stuck in traffic, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences a loss of propulsion
error messages appear on the dashboard
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear
the vehicle comes to a stop and locks up.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defective battery can cause the vehicle to lose propulsion, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded, and can also cause fires, resulting in property damage or injury.
symptoms: The vehicle experiences a loss of propulsion
reduced battery capacity and range
error messages appear on the dashboard
the vehicle is unable to charge fully.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended acceleration can cause accidents, resulting in property damage or injury.
symptoms: The vehicle suddenly accelerates
the brakes are unresponsive
the vehicle continues to accelerate even when the brake pedal is pressed.
